pages.title: Some Egg Shells
pages.text:
In order to advance from your status of a stump clapper, you'll need to get some eggshells. In order to obtain them, it's necessary to have a renewable source of $(9)Sand/$ ($(5)$(o)Integrated Dynamics Squeezer/$) and a $(9)Bowl/$.
Be careful not to replace the water block, or you'll be completely stuck; that is, unless you $(o)start over/$...

pages.title: The Art of Panning
pages.text: Place the Sand under $(o)$(l)flowing/$ Water, hold $(k:key.sneak), and use the Bowl on the placed Sand.
Egg Shells can be burned (or smelted) into Fired Egg Shells, which are a necessary component in creating $(l:beginnings/the_great_egg)Lime.
pages.liquid4tooltip2: &7125ml per Small Pile of Clay Dust

pages.text:
Crushed Egg Shells are rich in calcium, and can be used to regrow grass, with a small chance of instantly growing either a Poppy or a Dandelion on said grass.
It's also a decent snack when you're feeling peckish.
If you're in a desperate need of $(2)Floral Fertilizer/$, Crushed Egg Shells substitute bone meal in its creation!
Crushed Egg Shells are also used to create a Fel Pumpkin, which is necessary in $(l:chickens/blaze_chicken)summoning a Blazicken/$ later on.
